loadstring(game:HttpGet("https://rawscripts.net/raw/Just-a-baseplate.-Just-A-Baseplate-Working-Reanimation-39126"))()
task.wait(3)
loadstring(game:HttpGet("https://rawscripts.net/raw/Universal-Script-Delta-keyboard-cracked-by-Ata-27431"))()
task.wait(1)
getgenv().iSaidEpic = true
loadstring(game:HttpGet("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sparezirt/Script/refs/heads/main/.github/Modded/EKDV1.txt"))()
task.wait(2)
game:GetService("TextChatService").TextChannels.RBXGeneral:SendAsync("Epic script")
